text: Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza khein ndɨkndɨgir farfa rivgi. Ndu ŋgɨp mbarar uk su. Ndu uk suv, mba fhara zav ndu uga ndigi mbɨgam, ndu ana kamthooŋ ntarav, ana kamthooŋ vhen ganɨnga, ndu kɨma raraŋ thueŋ gangirga. Mba kɨma rareŋ ndu ne ndigi zɨv mben nɨɨŋgiri. Ndu ŋka wani khɨnan mba ŋkɨɨan mben nɨɨŋgiri.”
